Question: RevComm, Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
RevComm, Inc

MiiTel at CES® 2024

- MiiTel, an AI-based smart telephony system, analyzes sales calls and contact center operations, addressing the "Black Box" problem in communication.
- Features MiiTel Meetings for online meetings and RecPod for visualizing face-to-face business conversations.
- Voice data collected by MiiTel serves various purposes such as internal training, service development, and functionality improvement.
- Recognized with awards including Forbes AI 50 2023 list.
- Available in Japan, the United States, and Indonesia.

RevComm will exhibit MiiTel at CES® 2024, showcasing its AI-based communication solution and aiming to introduce it to more companies worldwide.
